department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Translation services for Parliamentry Proceedings, English to French, in the national capital region.
full_summary:
Translated Parliamentary Proceedings
Request for Proposal (RFP)
Trade Agreement: No Material Requirement
Tendering Procedures: Targeted List and Invitation
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Value Approach
Crown Retains the Right to Negotiate
Documentation Language: Either Official Language
Delivery Date: As Specified Above

**Solicitation Number:** EP745-241969/A
**Amendment Number:** 1

The **Public Works and Government Services Canada** invites suppliers pre-qualified in Tier 3 – Parliament Proceedings (English to French) under supply arrangement **EN966-140305** to submit a bid for the translation services of 20,000 meters, contract of **7 days** duration.

The section of dossier(s) of this solicitation request, contract for **3,880,000 words**, aid in dossiers vague inquiries regarding the nature of this work for possible solicitation. Canada reserves the right to negotiate with best interested bidder.
